channel.title: risks on code.zoia.org
channel.description: Recent content in risks on code.zoia.org

item.title: Don't be afraid to take risks
item.description: A quote from _why about experimenting and taking risks, before his disapparition. I do not write tests for my code. I do not write very many comments. I change styles very frequently. And most of all, I shun the predominant styles of coding, because that would go against the very essence of experimentation. In short: all I do is muck around. So, my way of measuring a great programmer is different from some prevailing thought on the subject.

item.title: Don't be afraid to take risks
item.description: A quote from _why about experimenting and taking risks, before his disapparition. I do not write tests for my code. I do not write very many comments. I change styles very frequently. And most of all, I shun the predominant styles of coding, because that would go against the very essence of experimentation. In short: all I do is muck around. So, my way of measuring a great programmer is different from some prevailing thought on the subject.
